text: I mean both games are really just a whole bunch of characters in a musical world having musical battles, only Pop'n got a more serious story after a while and isn't much about freestyling and more about doing exactly what the screen says.

author: deogenerate

text: As a big fan of this series' music, it shouldn't be too surprising to see so many entries in this list (10th one if I'm not wrong!). There's just something about these upbeat, sometimes vocal tracks that always get me in a good mood.
author: SupraDarky
